author: Staff Reporter
title: The ultimate 30-day US road trip
text:
The ultimate 30-day US road trip Article By: Staff Reporter Tue, 18 Aug 2015 8:23 AM Share Your Email The Grand Canyon. Credit: pixabay.com/ dieter55 
The United States of America is a vast country, with expansive forests , deserts, mountains and an array of magnificent tourist attractions. 
It would be impossible to see it all in one trip, but MyOffers has created a road trip itinerary which will let you see amazing sights while enjoying the best of America. 
The trip starts from the JFK Airport in New York, taking you through Manhattan to see the Statue of Liberty and later, Times Square in New York City. 
The trip ends in Hollywood, Los Angeles, after 30 days. 
However, it's unlikely that many of us will have 30 days to spare which we can spend on a road trip. 
Luckily, MyOffer's infographic gives you a great summary of the itinerary to pick and choose from. 
However, if you are lucky enough to do the entire trip, you will see wonders such as New Orleans, the Grand Canyon and Las Vegas. 
Have a look at MyOffer's ultimate 30-day US road trip below: Related Articles
